headline: Alphabet and Tesla Earnings, Home Sales and More: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season rolls on this week, with the first of the Magnificent Seven tech names to report, Tesla and Google parent Alphabet. New economic data will shed more light on how tariffs are affecting consumer and business spending, and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is slated to speak on bank regulation.

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From AT&T Stock Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
summary: AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) will release earnings results for the second quarter, before the opening bell on Wednesday, July 23. Analysts expect the Dallas-based company to report quarterly earnings at 53 cents per share, down from 57 cents per share in the year-ago period. AT&T projects to report quarterly revenue of $30.46 billion. It reported $29.8 billion the previous year, according to data from Benzinga Pro. On July 16, Morgan Stanley analyst Simon Flannery maintained an Overweight rating for AT&T.
